description:
Advanced API Debugging Proxy

Reqable is a flutter-based, cross-platform app, which enables developers to capture, inspect, and manipulate HTTP(s) requests/responses with ease. Support Windows, macOS, linux, iOS and Android devices.

ğŸ’ª [OPT] Compatible with ADB 36.0.0 and 36.0.1 versions where the last character of pushed files is truncated, causing Reqable one-click certificate installation to fail.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] Display application process ID in the capture overview tab.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] Added TCP connection information to script context.

ğŸ [FIX] The bug where switching environment variables during script execution caused variables to update to the wrong environment.
